description: Download a 14-day, fully functional free trial of Red Gate's .NET Reflector. .NET Reflector is a class browser, decompiler and static analyzer for software created with .NET Framework, originally written by Lutz Roeder. MSDN Magazine named it as one of the Ten Must-Have utilities for developers, and Scott Hanselman listed it as part of his Big Ten Life and Work-Changing Utilities
author: Redgate
